title: You Two Will Give Birth To Me In The Future - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Aristocracy   Child Protagonist   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Heterochromia   Knights   Magic   Nobles   Royalty   Second Chance
author: Rakki   롹끼
description:
At the age of 6, she lost her father and mother and became the Empress of the Holy Empire.

However, the truth is she’s only a puppet used by her uncle.

A miserable life that will eventually end up by being murdered as a witch.

“If you close your eyes and open them again, everything will never happen. Go back to the past and find your mom!”

But at the last minute, I did a miracle.

“Ah…”

“huh…?”

She got a single chance to save everyone she loved.
>
